definition[0]: to raise, lift, or pull something up, especially using ropes
example[0]: The crew hurried to hoist the flag.
definition[1]: a piece of equipment used for lifting heavy objects with ropes
definition[2]: a movement that lifts something up
example[2]: Give me a hoist onto your shoulders.
definition[3]: to increase something quickly or suddenly
example[3]: The state is getting ready to hoist its sales tax next week.
